timespan.description: Which timeseries data to render on the chart.

width.description: The width of the chart in px.

height.description: The height of the chart in px.

grid.description: If a background grid shall be rendered or not.

styleOptions.description: A map like object providing the chart style for each timeseries (by id).

chartType.description: The chart type to render for the timeseries.

properties.description: The actual style properties for the declared chart type.
